tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have been visiting shilpa ma'am for a year now for pregnancy related issues. 
***** ** ** ********* ****** ** *** ***** * Not just that, her patience to listen to the problems and positivity she spreads is highly appreciated. These qualities are very essential for the type of patients who would reach out to her.
Pre-Pregnancy consultation. 
Shilpa ma'am has been a pillar like support for us in the time of distress. We approached her after a biochemical pregnancy loss and unable to conceive again. She explained us the importance of staying stress free during the pregnancy journey and suggested very few medicines. She explained the situation very well and suggested IUI. IUI was also performed by her. Within a month of consulting her, I was pregnant. 
Pregnancy consultation 
We continued to visit ma'am for pregnancy checkup. Ma'am used to call us only when needed and she used to give preference to pregnant patients. She never suggested unnecessary scans ans medicines. Most of the minor issues were resolved mostly on phone. 
During pregnancy I was tested COVID + and ma'am also suggested necessary medication over phone and assured us that the baby is safe. She didn't charge me anything for these. Also she monitored baby and my health throughout pregnancy. 
Delivery
Due to low amniotic fluid, I had to be rushed to emergency for c-section. Ma'am was there to ensure that baby and I were safe. She even ensured that breast milk is sufficient for the baby and latching position is apt. 

Shilpa ma'am is doctor for my mother in law as well. She operated my mil for uterus removal and health was completely monitored by her. 
I strongly recommend ma'am for her expertise and attitude with which she treats patients. Like we have general physician, women especially need gynecologist esp like shilpa ma'am

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
In our life, there were a lot of unexpected tragedies that happened in 2019. Fate was taking away people from us and we felt, like any other Indian that extending family is the only way we can come out of the pain and have a fruitful life ahead. We had our doubts when we decided to go to a fertility clinic like any of you have. Whether this is right decision, right place, where these clinics are trust worthy. But all those fear & worries left us since we met Dr.Shilpa Mam. In this era, you hardly see a genuine and caring doctor like Shilpa Mam who prescribes medicine ONLY if it's essential. Only due to mam's proper knowledge, experience and care, we are glad to tell you that, we are now proud parents of twin baby girls. We really don't know how to thank Mam for this!
Apart from what I mentioned above, one unique quality Mam have is, she is so positive person. Not only me, I could see that positive energy flowing to my wife every time we meet Mam. It was very much needed for us especially after a very unfortunate incident happened in our family prior to meeting mam. As you know, when we go through this phase, it's quite natural that we get nervous. Trust me, the day we met Shilpa Mam, a positive energy started flowing to our mind & soul. She eases our tension with kind motivating words & care. She even sacrificed her consulting fee(of course we will pay it soon) on the day when our babies surprised us by their decision to come out early. we owe our entire happiness to mam. \n\nYou can trust my words as not a marketing content but true facts to the fullest. Mam is more than sister & mother to us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We do not think any amounts of words would be enough to share our thankfulness. We were trying to conceive since 2 years and visited multiple doctors but didn't get positive result. We lost all hopes and finally we consulted Dr. Shilpa ma'am. When I met with her first time with full of tensed, Ma'am listened to me patiently and assured me that I'll be Mom soon. After meeting her we felt so relaxed and pretty confident that now we reached the right place. Under her guidance, medication and follow ups we went with the treatment. After a lots of struggle, finally I got my good news. Now we got a clear understanding on what and where we are failing, which she explained everything very clearly. A big Thanks to Dr. Shilpa for giving us a wonderful gift. Shilpa ma'am is a ray of hope for many couple like us. She is well experienced, very friendly, very caring and always smiling and like a Mom to us in advising right things to do. Shilpa ma'am is always available on WhatsApp and call for any kind of queries. We are always thankful to the entire Milan staff in making our dream come true. I would definitely recommend her for any fertility related issues.
reply_text: Thanku dear for your kind words and all the best üòäüëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Family Planning,Female Infertility Treatment,
review: We were lucky to be in touch with Dr Shilpa Ellur from last year. Initially l was consulted couple of other gynaecologists but felt that the personal touch was missing.Then one day l consulted Dr.Shilpa @Milann.ln first visit only she found the problem and started the treatment immediately.she gives attention to each and every small things about your health.she is too passionate about her work and gives attention to every patient.and also she responds to queries at anytime.she explains each and every thing very clearly.Now my problem is solved and I conceived.Thanks üôè üôèüôèShilpa mam.
reply_text: Thanks dear for ur kind words

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: I still waiting at the reception as I write this. Its been more than an hour of waiting time and still waiting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Dr. Shilpa is very soft spoken, supportive and practical. She explains everything in detail and also shares her personal experiences to make us feel at ease. She keeps the visits and tests to minimum while ensuring that utmost care is taken, if required. She has been with us in 2 most critical and difficult journeys - delivering my twin daughters and operating for removing my breast abscess. She is always available and has answered silliest of my queries. We are extremely happy that she has been with us through this phase of our life. I would highly recommend her.
reply_text: Thanku dear for the kind words.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and listens to our problems.  She is very organized and explains the treatment procedure in detail.  She made sure the our concerns are addressed before moving to treatment.  We have been taking  treatment from last 8 months and very satisfied with the service.  She is very approachable and provide instant response through whatsapp/phone call when urgent assistance required. We have witnessed lot of progress in our treatment and got positive result.  I strongly recommend the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr Shilpa was wonderful..she was very supportive and helpful throughout my pregnancy. She always encouraged me whenever I needed the most.. not only she successfully operated me with my beautiful daughter but also provided post pregnancy care and consultation.. I am still in touch with her and shall highly recommend her ... in handling high risk pregnancy and other gynaec issues..Feeling blessed to have found her and I consider her no less than an angel helping me throughout my journey of pregnancy.. and supporting me psychologically ...Thanks a lot shilpa ma'am.. much love and respect to you ..Regards,Chandrika

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am writing to express my deepest gratitude to you and your exceptional team at millan for the successful treatment Your unwavering commitment to providing compassionate care, coupled with your expertise, has made this journey significantly more manageable. The entire process, from initial consultations to the procedure itself, was marked by professionalism and genuine concern for my well-being.I want to extend my appreciation to Dr Shilpa and  Each member played a crucial role in creating a supportive and comfortable environment. Their kindness and attentiveness did not go unnoticed, and it greatly contributed to my overall positive experience.Please convey my gratitude to everyone involved, and thank you once again for your dedication to making dreams of parenthood a reality.Warm regards,Chandan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr Shipa for my pragnancy from the very first month as suggested by one of our friend and the experience with her is fabulous.She explained everything in easy way and always welcome us in a smiling face. Due to lockdown for 1 to 2 months it was not possible to visit her personally but  that time she always available and suggested the scans and medicine on phone and messages. During 8 months of my pregnancy there was some complication but the way she handled and support,it was really tremendous and  because of that 14th sept 2020 ,we blessed with a baby boy and I would like to continue with her post delivery as well.Thanku so much Dr shilpa :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My experience with Dr Shilpa is wonderful.  She is very soft spoken, supportive and helpful throughout my pregnancy. She always welcomed me with smile. She is very patient and calm in her approach which will help anyone to deal with any type of pregnancy related issues. Most importantly she never suggested unnecessary tests and medicines rather advice and encourage for home remedies.She successfully operated me with beautiful daughter and also provided post pregnancy care and consultation. She always made herself available over phone for any concerns and replies as early as possible. I am feeling blessed to have her as my doctor. I highly recommend her for any gynic related treatments.@Dr Shilpa: Thank you so much for your support and guidance.

review: My experience with Dr.Shilpa was wonderful. She was extremely caring, supportive and kind.Doctor received us like a family with her smile when I meet her I feel like my own sister. Last November,2019 we met her for the first time with primary infertility. She was polite and took time to explain us things and gave us moral support during my IVF procedures and my first IVF cycle was successful. I am enjoying my 3rd month pregnancy now. She always addressed our concerns politely at any time. Her experience and commendable knowledge  makes us feel that we are in safe hands. Thank alot doctor, my whole family will remember u in our entire life. I would highly recommend  Dr.Shilpa for IVF and gynec treatments.

The Doctor was patience in understanding our concern and addressing them. My wife had lot of questions for which the doctor responded well with answers. We are continuing our treatment with doctor and we are confident about treatment and results.
